languages.text: "Махарий слишком узколоб, чтобы даже помыслить о том, чтобы пойти против Вольного Торговца — даже фальшивки. Поэтому мне пришлось ждать удобного момента... и исчезновение Лорд-капитана пришлось как нельзя кстати. Запустить цепную реакцию на Даргонусе, чтобы люди припомнили старые заслуги господина Войгтвира, оказалось просто — кажется, многие из ваших подданных действительно не считают вас достойн{mf|ым|ой} наследни{mf|ком|цей}".

"Macharius is too narrow-minded to even consider opposing the Rogue Trader, even an illegitimate one. So I had to wait for the right moment... and the disappearance of the Lord Captain could not have come at a better time. It was quite simple to trigger a chain of events on Dargonus so that the people remembered Master Voigtvir's past service — it seems that many of your subjects do not actually consider you a worthy successor."
languages.original_text: "Махарий слишком узколоб, чтобы даже помыслить о том, чтобы пойти против Вольного Торговца — даже фальшивки. Поэтому мне пришлось ждать удобного момента... и исчезновение Лорд-капитана пришлось как нельзя кстати. Запустить цепную реакцию на Даргонусе, чтобы люди припомнили старые заслуги господина Войгтвира, оказалось просто — кажется, многие из ваших подданных действительно не считают вас достойн{mf|ым|ой} наследни{mf|ком|цей}".

traits.locale_text: "Macharias is to narrow-minded to even think about opposing the Rogue Trader — even a fake one. So I had to wait for the right moment... And the disappearance of Lord Captain came in rather handy. The chain reaction on Dargonus so the people would remember the past service of Master Voigtvir had been easy to start — it seems that many of your subjects do not actually consider you a worthy successor."
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: 「マハリウスは頭が固すぎて、自由開拓者に逆らうなんて考えもしない…そいつが正統でなくとも。だから私は、時機を待たなくてはならなかった…ロード・キャプテンの失踪はまたとない機会だったわ。住民がマスタ－・ボイトヴィルの過去の献身を思い出してからは、ダルゴナスで連鎖反応を起こすのはたやすかった。実際、あなたは後継者にふさわしくないと思っている家臣は相当いるみたいよ」
languages.original_text: "Macharius is too narrow-minded to even consider opposing the Rogue Trader, even an illegitimate one. So I had to wait for the right moment... and the disappearance of the Lord Captain could not have come at a better time. It was quite simple to trigger a chain of events on Dargonus so that the people remembered Master Voigtvir's past service — it seems that many of your subjects do not actually consider you a worthy successor."

traits.locale_text: 「マハリウスは頭が固すぎて、自由開拓者に逆らうなんて考えもしない…そいつが正統でなくとも。だから私は、時機を待たなくてはならなかった…ロード・キャプテンの失踪はまたとない機会だったわ。住民がマスタ－・ボイトヴィルの過去の献身を思い出してからは、ダルゴナスで連鎖反応を起こすのはたやすかった。実際、あなたは後継者にふさわしくないと思っている家臣は相当いるみたいよ」
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: “马卡里乌斯粗鄙短视，根本不可能反对行商浪人，哪怕这人只是个冒牌货。所以我只能独自等待时机……而行商浪人的失踪的这个时机，正好可以用来大做文章。想在达戈努斯引发一连串连锁反应，让人们回想起维特威尔大师曾经做出的杰出贡献，并不是什么难事。看起来，似乎有很多臣民并不承认你是真正的继任者。”
languages.original_text: "Macharius is too narrow-minded to even consider opposing the Rogue Trader, even an illegitimate one. So I had to wait for the right moment... and the disappearance of the Lord Captain could not have come at a better time. It was quite simple to trigger a chain of events on Dargonus so that the people remembered Master Voigtvir's past service — it seems that many of your subjects do not actually consider you a worthy successor."

traits.locale_text: “马卡里乌斯粗鄙短视，根本不可能反对行商浪人，哪怕这人只是个冒牌货。所以我只能独自等待时机……而行商浪人的失踪的这个时机，正好可以用来大做文章。想在达戈努斯引发一连串连锁反应，让人们回想起维特威尔大师曾经做出的杰出贡献，并不是什么难事。看起来，似乎有很多臣民并不承认你是真正的继任者。”
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: « Macharius est bien trop étroit d'esprit pour ne serait-ce qu'envisager l'éventualité de s'opposer à {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}... même si {mf|celui|celle}-ci n'est qu'{mf|un usurpateur|une usurpatrice}. Je devais donc attendre le bon moment... et il faut bien reconnaître que la disparition {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} est tombée à point nommé. Il a été étonnamment facile de déclencher sur Dargonus une réaction en chaîne qui rappellerait Voigtvir au bon souvenir du peuple. Il semblerait que bon nombre de vos sujets ne vous estiment pas digne de succéder à Théodora. »
languages.original_text: "Macharius is too narrow-minded to even consider opposing the Rogue Trader, even an illegitimate one. So I had to wait for the right moment... and the disappearance of the Lord Captain could not have come at a better time. It was quite simple to trigger a chain of events on Dargonus so that the people remembered Master Voigtvir's past service — it seems that many of your subjects do not actually consider you a worthy successor."

traits.locale_text: « Macharius est bien trop étroit d'esprit pour ne serait-ce qu'envisager l'éventualité de s'opposer à {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}... même si {mf|celui|celle}-ci n'est qu'{mf|un usurpateur|une usurpatrice}. Je devais donc attendre le bon moment... et il faut bien reconnaître que la disparition {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} est tombée à point nommé. Il a été étonnamment facile de déclencher sur Dargonus une réaction en chaîne qui rappellerait Voigtvir au bon souvenir du peuple. Il semblerait que bon nombre de vos sujets ne vous estiment pas digne de succéder à Théodora. »
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: «Macharius es demasiado cerrado de miras como para oponerse {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente, aunque sea {mf|un impostor|una impostora}. Tuve que esperar el momento adecuado... Y la desaparición de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán llegó en el momento ideal. Fue pan comido desencadenar una serie de sucesos en Dargonus para que la gente recordara el servicio del maestro Voigtvir. Parece que muchos de sus súbditos no {mf|le|la} consideran {mf|digno sucesor|digna sucesora}».
languages.original_text: "Macharius is too narrow-minded to even consider opposing the Rogue Trader, even an illegitimate one. So I had to wait for the right moment... and the disappearance of the Lord Captain could not have come at a better time. It was quite simple to trigger a chain of events on Dargonus so that the people remembered Master Voigtvir's past service — it seems that many of your subjects do not actually consider you a worthy successor."

traits.locale_text: «Macharius es demasiado cerrado de miras como para oponerse {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente, aunque sea {mf|un impostor|una impostora}. Tuve que esperar el momento adecuado... Y la desaparición de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán llegó en el momento ideal. Fue pan comido desencadenar una serie de sucesos en Dargonus para que la gente recordara el servicio del maestro Voigtvir. Parece que muchos de sus súbditos no {mf|le|la} consideran {mf|digno sucesor|digna sucesora}».
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: "Macharius ist zu engstirnig, um überhaupt in Erwägung zu ziehen, sich gegen {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zu stellen, selbst wenn {mf|er|sie} illegitim ist. Ich musste also auf den richtigen Augenblick warten ... und der Lord Captain hätte zu keinem besseren Zeitpunkt verschwinden können. Es war recht einfach, auf Dargonus eine Kette von Ereignissen in Gang zu setzen, um die Leute dort an Meister Voigtvirs Dienste zu erinnern ... wie es scheint, halten Euch viele Eurer Untertanen nicht für {mf|einen würdigen Nachfolger|eine würdige Nachfolgerin}."
languages.original_text: "Macharius is too narrow-minded to even consider opposing the Rogue Trader, even an illegitimate one. So I had to wait for the right moment... and the disappearance of the Lord Captain could not have come at a better time. It was quite simple to trigger a chain of events on Dargonus so that the people remembered Master Voigtvir's past service — it seems that many of your subjects do not actually consider you a worthy successor."

traits.locale_text: "Macharius ist zu engstirnig, um überhaupt in Erwägung zu ziehen, sich gegen {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zu stellen, selbst wenn es {mf|ein unrechtmäßiger Freihändler|eine unrechtmäßige Freihändlerin} ist. Ich musste also auf den richtigen Augenblick warten ... Und das Verschwinden des Lord Captains kam mir recht gelegen. Es war ein Leichtes, auf Dargonus eine Kettenreaktion auszulösen, damit die Leute sich an Meister Voigtvirs Dienst erinnern. Offenbar halten Euch viele Eurer Untertanen nicht für {mf|einen würdigen Nachfolger|eine würdige Nachfolgerin}."
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: "Macharius, gayrimeşru da olsa Hür Tacir'e baş kaldırmazdı. Bunun için fazla dar görüşlü. Bu sebeple doğru vakti kollamam gerekti... Lord Kaptan'ın kayboluşu daha uygun bir zamana denk gelemezdi. Üstat Voigtvir'in yaptığı hizmetleri insanlara hatırlatmak için Dargonus'ta birtakım hadiseler tertiplemek hayli amiyane oldu. Öyle ki tebaanızdan birçok kimse, işgal ettiğiniz makama yaraştığınızı düşünmüyormuş."
languages.original_text: "Macharius is too narrow-minded to even consider opposing the Rogue Trader, even an illegitimate one. So I had to wait for the right moment... and the disappearance of the Lord Captain could not have come at a better time. It was quite simple to trigger a chain of events on Dargonus so that the people remembered Master Voigtvir's past service — it seems that many of your subjects do not actually consider you a worthy successor."

traits.locale_text: "Macharius, gayrimeşru da olsa Hür Tacir'e baş kaldırmazdı. Bunun için fazla dar görüşlü. Bu sebeple doğru vakti kollamam gerekti... Lord Kaptan'ın kayboluşu daha uygun bir zamana denk gelemezdi. Üstat Voigtvir'in yaptığı hizmetleri insanlara hatırlatmak için Dargonus'ta birtakım hadiseler tertiplemek hayli amiyane oldu. Öyle ki tebaanızdan birçok kişi, işgal ettiğiniz makama yaraştığınızı düşünmüyormuş."
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback
